name: The Call of His People

Official sites: Website about Robert Levy who was the producer of the movie The Call of His People. - https://www.robertlevyproducer.org/
Website of historical documentary that features story about The Call of His People movie. - https://www.beforetheharlemrenaissance.com/

description: Nelson Holmes, a black man posing as a white man, had advanced from office boy to general manager. Nelson, hiding his true identity for obvious reasons, comes face to face with an old classmate during a job interview. Fearing that...
